IX.iii.1.J.2.d
.
Handling an $80,000 Estate When Net Worth Is Not a Bar
If a Section 306 Pension beneficiary has a net worth of $80,000 or more and it is determined that net worth is not a bar to entitlement, prepare an administrative decision on
VA Form 21P-5427
.
Note
:Â  Preparation of
VA Form 21P-5427
is not required if the determination is favorable and the estate is less than $80,000.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section J - Net Worth, Asset Transfers, and Penalty Periods
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section J
